member.name: T:WGP.SFDynamicObject.ResourceManager
member.summary: Manager that holds SFML resources.

member.summary: The resource.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.ResourceManager.Resource.Path
member.summary: The path to the file of the resource.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.ResourceManager.Path
member.summary: The filepath to the resource manager.

member.summary: Saves the manager to a file.

member.name: T:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject
member.summary: Dynamic object. Supports multi sprite, bones and animations.

member.name: F:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject.CurrentVersion
member.summary: Version of the current SFDynamicObject encoder/decoder.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject.Version
member.summary: Version of the created object.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject.BonesHierarchy
member.summary: The hierarchy of the bones. All bones must be here. The order in the hierarchy will be the order of drawing the sprites from the bones.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject.MasterBones
member.summary: The list of the master bones. All child bones must NOT be referenced here.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject.Animations
member.summary: Animations available for the bones.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject.TransitionTime
member.summary: Time between animations to smooth the transition.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject.Manager
member.summary: Sets the ResourceManager used by the object. It should contain the necessary resources for the object.

member.name: M:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: M:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject.GetLocalBounds
member.summary: Returns the local bounding box.

member.name: M:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject.GetGlobalBounds
member.summary: Returns the global bounding box.

member.name: M:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject.LoadAnimation(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String[])
member.summary: Loads an animation. If a chronometer is set, it will reset.
member.param: Name of the animation to load.
Queue containing the following animations to play once the current is finished.

member.name: M:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject.ResetAnimation
member.summary: Resets the positon of the object, making it in the default position

member.name: M:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject.Update
member.summary: Updates the display of the object by adjusting the bones to match the animations. Won't have any effect if there are no chronometer set or no animation loaded.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject.Chronometer
member.summary: Chronometer of the animation. Need to be set to animate.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject.CurrentTime
member.summary: The current time of the internal chronometer.

member.name: M:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject.LoadFromFile(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads an object from a file.
member.param: Does the object try to parse newer versions ?

member.name: M:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject.ReloadManager
member.summary: Reload the manager. If one of his texture which is used in this object has been changed, it will take effect.

member.name: M:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject.LoadFromStream(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads an object from a stream.
member.param: Does the object try to parse newer versions ?

member.name: M:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject.LoadFromMemory(System.Byte[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads an object from the memory.
member.param: Does the object try to parse newer versions ?

member.name: M:WGP.SFDynamicObject.SFDynamicObject.SaveToStream(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Saves the object to a stream.

member.name: T:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation
member.summary: An animation. contains all the key of the bones to animate.

member.name: T:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key
member.summary: A key. a key is a transformation at the right moment in the timeline. The dynamic object will make interpolations between the keys.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.Opacity
member.summary: The opacity of the bone. Doesn't inherit from its parent.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.Color
member.summary: The color of the sprite.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.PosFctCoeff
member.summary: Coefficient of the position function.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.OutlineColor
member.summary: The outline color of the sprite.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.OutlineThickness
member.summary: The outline thickness of the sprite.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.PosFunction
member.summary: How the position will be calculated.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.OriginFctCoeff
member.summary: Coefficient of the origin function.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.OriginFunction
member.summary: How the origin will be calculated.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.RotFctCoeff
member.summary: Coefficient of the rotation function.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.RotFunction
member.summary: How the rotation will be calculated.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.ScaleFctCoeff
member.summary: Coefficient of the scale function.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.ScaleFunction
member.summary: How the scale will be calculated.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.OpacityFctCoeff
member.summary: Coefficient of the opacity function.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.OpacityFunction
member.summary: How the opacity will be calculated.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.ColorFctCoeff
member.summary: Coefficient of the color function.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.ColorFunction
member.summary: How the color will be calculated.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.OutlineColorFctCoeff
member.summary: Coefficient of the outline color function.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.OutlineColorFunction
member.summary: How the outline color will be calculated.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.OutlineThicknessFctCoeff
member.summary: Coefficient of the outline thickness function.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.OutlineThicknessFunction
member.summary: How the outline thickness will be calculated.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.Transform
member.summary: The transformations to add (or multiply in the case of scaling) to the bone.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.Position
member.summary: The position in time of the key in the timeline.

member.name: M:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Key.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Bones
member.summary: A double array of all the keys of the animation, sorted by bones.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Name
member.summary: The name of the animation. Needed when loading an animation.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.Duration
member.summary: The total duration of the animation. Once the chronometer reach the duration, it will reset.

member.name: M:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Animation.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: F:WGP.SFDynamicObject.BlendModeType.BLEND_ALPHA
member.summary: Default blendmode.

member.summary: Additive blendmode.

member.name: F:WGP.SFDynamicObject.BlendModeType.BLEND_MULT
member.summary: Multiplicative blendmode.

member.name: F:WGP.SFDynamicObject.BlendModeType.BLEND_SUB
member.summary: Substractive blendmode.

member.name: T:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Bone
member.summary: A basic bone.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Bone.BlendMode
member.summary: BlendMode used to draw this bone.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Bone.Opacity
member.summary: Opacity of the bone. Can only be changed using keys and animations.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Bone.Color
member.summary: Color of the bone. Can only be changed using keys and animations.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Bone.OutlineColor
member.summary: OutlineColor of the bone. Can only be changed using keys and animations.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Bone.OutlineThickness
member.summary: Outline thickness of the bone. Can only be changed using keys and animations.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Bone.DrawTempSpritesFirst
member.summary: This bone should draw its temporary sprites before its attached sprites ?

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Bone.ChildBones
member.summary: The childs of the bone. They will be relative to their parent.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Bone.ComputedTransform
member.summary: The absolute transforms of the bone. For internal uses only.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Bone.AttachedSprites
member.summary: The list of sprites affected by the changes of the bone. Be careful of the order (the order of drawing). The string is the name of the texture in the texture manager.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Bone.TemporarySprites
member.summary: The temporary sprites are not saved but they are drawn at the same time as the bone. They are usually used for small details that change often in a game.

member.name: P:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Bone.Name
member.summary: The name of the bone. Needed for animations.

member.name: M:WGP.SFDynamicObject.Bone.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor.
